description:
Dark Schneider put his life on the line and used the Evil Blaze of Burning Exodus on Abigail, but Abigail just won`t give up and reemerges from the rubbles. Dark Schneider, who is completely beaten up, has no more hands to play with Yoko being used as a shield... Will Sean Ari and Kai Harn of the Three Sorcerer Generals save the day?
Source: Official Website
